about_the_game:
Due to some unforeseen circumstances, you have lost your kid whose name is Milo to some bigger authority which has more power but now you have to take the revenge and go on the journey to find your kid in this cruel world.



A Lost Whisker is a Third Person Cat adventure game with some action on your journey where you play as a Cat named Meimei. The game portrays a stunning environment and a cozy Japanese setting. Meet new friends in your journey to find your kid and save others from some cruel beings, as you progress you will face difficult obstacles, puzzles, and foes who will try to stop you from getting together with your kid.



See the world through the eyes of a cat and interact with the environment in playful ways. Be stealthy, nimble, silly, and sometimes have fun with fellow animals in the game.



A Lost Whisker is developed by Crazy Paws Games, who is a Solo Developer following his passion for games.
detailed_description:
Discord Community


About the Game

Due to some unforeseen circumstances, you have lost your kid whose name is Milo to some bigger authority which has more power but now you have to take the revenge and go on the journey to find your kid in this cruel world.



A Lost Whisker is a Third Person Cat adventure game with some action on your journey where you play as a Cat named Meimei. The game portrays a stunning environment and a cozy Japanese setting. Meet new friends in your journey to find your kid and save others from some cruel beings, as you progress you will face difficult obstacles, puzzles, and foes who will try to stop you from getting together with your kid.



See the world through the eyes of a cat and interact with the environment in playful ways. Be stealthy, nimble, silly, and sometimes have fun with fellow animals in the game.



A Lost Whisker is developed by Crazy Paws Games, who is a Solo Developer following his passion for games.
name: A Lost Whisker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: You play as a Cat on a journey to find your lost kid in an adventure-based single-player action game with a diverse and beautiful environment, charming characters, heartfelt storytelling, clever obstacles, and intense battles, experience an emotional journey filled with exploration and discovery.
